backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine chat UI and behavior requirements to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the main frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and theme variable setup defining color tokens and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component implementing Valentine chat UI, message state, auto-scroll, and delayed bot replies.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity loading, and auth client behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Full Valentine UI styling including gradient background, card layout, chat bubbles, and button styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, goals, existing features, deployment target, and known issues for building a Valentine-themed interactive chat app.
